node.statement: SETUP: Let p, q in P_n with roots mu_1 < ... < mu_n and nu_1 < ... < nu_n respectively. Let r = p âŠž_n q with roots lambda_1 < ... < lambda_n (well-defined and simple by MSS_real_rootedness). The inequality 1/Phi_n(r) >= 1/Phi_n(p) + 1/Phi_n(q) is equivalent to Phi_n(p)*Phi_n(q) >= Phi_n(r)*(Phi_n(p) + Phi_n(q)), i.e., the harmonic mean bound Phi_n(r) <= Phi_n(p)*Phi_n(q)/(Phi_n(p)+Phi_n(q)).
